title: Here after foloweth a mornynge remembrau[n]ce had at the moneth mynde of the noble prynces Margarete countesse of Rychemonde [et] Darbye moder vnto kynge Henry the. vii. [et] grandame to oure souerayne lorde that nowe is, vppon whose soule almyghty god haue mercy
author: Fisher, John, Saint, 1469-1535.
publicationStmtPublisher: In Flete strete at the sygne of the sonne by Wynkyn de Worde,
